blogPost.title: What are best practices for avoiding burnout and anxiety? Answer by @aprilrinne, author of Flux: 8 Superpowers for Thriving in Constant Change. https://t.co/f3xkLQRYkG https://t.co/ezeZ8wuvr9
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 燃え尽き症候群や不安を回避するためのベスト・プラクティスとは？Flux: 8 Superpowers for Thriving in Constant Change』の著者である @aprilrinne さんの回答です。 https://t.co/f3xkLQRYkG https://t.co/ezeZ8wuvr9
避免职业倦怠和焦虑的最佳做法是什么？回答者：@aprilrinne, Flux: 8 Superpowers for Thriving in Constant Change. https://t.co/f3xkLQRYkG https://t.co/ezeZ8wuvr9
避免職業倦怠和焦慮的最佳做法是什麼？回答者：@aprilrinne, Flux: 8 Superpowers for Thriving in Constant Change. https://t.co/f3xkLQRYkG https://t.co/ezeZ8wuvr9

previous.title: What are your most important needs as a student? Answer by Michael S Roth (@mroth78), 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/a0zrMMlI2g https://t.co/Z8xHCenrL9

localize.full_text: 学生時代に最も必要なものは何ですか？Answer by Michael S Roth (@mroth78), 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/a0zrMMlI2g https://t.co/Z8xHCenrL9
作为一个学生，你最重要的需求是什么？回答者：Michael S Roth (@mroth78), 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/a0zrMMlI2g https://t.co/Z8xHCenrL9
作爲一個學生，你最重要的需求是什麼？回答者：Michael S Roth (@mroth78), 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/a0zrMMlI2g https://t.co/Z8xHCenrL9

我如何建立一份强有力的简历？回答者：Noah Gramitt，社会媒体协调员@wonsulting。https://t.co/oDFUm2P19G https://t.co/fIkwdT0KA8
我如何建立一份強有力的簡歷？回答者：Noah Gramitt，社會媒體協調員@wonsulting。https://t.co/oDFUm2P19G https://t.co/fIkwdT0KA8
